zad// lta dang bral bas rtsis las 'das// dug lnga'i rgyu rkyen bde ba che// brjod pa'i rgyu med smra bsam 'das// ye nas rang rig rnam par dag/ zag pa zad pas gdos bcas men// dngos po zad pas stong
par gnas// gnyis kyi 'phel med ngo bo nyid// chos dang bral bas mtha' las 'das// rtog med gsal bas 'gyu ba sangs// bem rig gnyis po tshogs gnyis rdzogs// dran pa'i zla med cog bzhag
rang// bcos pa'i tshig med kun la khyab// bsam med sems med dran pa gsal// so ma ma yin gnyug med dang// ma bcos cog bzhag rang grol nyid do// lkog med pa gdos nas dag// 'gyur ba ma yin
drang por gnas// yongs la khyab pa'i sems gcig bu// grub mtha' rdzogs pa'i spyi phud yin// thog ma bar dang tha ma grub// de ltar 'bras bu 'khrul med gzhi// rang rig ye nas 'od re
gsal// sku gsum ye nas ma bskyed rdzogs// 'bras bu rang gnas chen po la// chos nyid ye nas bcos su med// grub mtha' ye nas skyabs dang bral// dug lngas ye nas gos pa med// 'khor 'das 'du

'bral ga la yod// mngon sum gsal ba brjid re che// snang ba sna tshogs lhun re sdug/ chos sku ngo sprod dang re spro// ngo bo zang thal yangs pa che// rang bzhin kun khyab brdal ba che// thugs rje kun khyab bskyed re

che// khyab pa ye dwangs bkrag re bzang// gnas la thog med bang re mgyogs// rig pa rang snang 'od re gsal// stong pa kun 'byung ngo re mtshar// snang srid gzhi bzhengs dpangs re mtho// kha dog lnga ldan bris
re legs// gzhi snang chen po ngo mtshar che// 'khor 'das gnyis po 'brel re mkhas// sku lnga ye shes rtsig pa mkhas// rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar do la// sangs rgyas med cing sems can med// ma rig med
cing 'khrul ba med// sems med yid kyang yod ma yin// dgra med bshes med rgyu rkyen med// phung po med cing khams kyang med// yul med 'dzin pa bya ba med// dbang po med cing yul yang med// gzung bar
bya zhing 'dzin pa med// dmigs med gzhal yas khang yang med// lha med mchod pa'i yul kyang med// gzhi la goms pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rang gi gnas kyang stongs par 'gyur// lam la goms pa'i rnal

'byor pas// 'byung ba rags pa'i dri ma zad// 'bras bu dag la su goms pa// ka dag sa la 'di yis phyin// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'di yis thob// sangs rgyas la yang grangs mangs kyang// rnam pa lnga ru 'dus

pa'o// ngo bo ka dag sangs rgyas dang// rang bzhin lhun grub sangs rgyas dang// thugs rje kun khyab sangs rgyas dang// 'bras bu rgyu dag sangs rgyas dang// mtshan ma yongs grol sangs rgyas so// de yang rnam pa

gnyis su 'dus// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang// mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// ngo bo sku ru rgyas pa dang// rang bzhin 'od du rgyas pa dang// thugs
rje'i zer du rgyas pa'o// mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// sku dang gdung dang 'ja' dang 'od// mngon sum gsal nas sangs rgyas pa'o// thog mar ma rig pa yi sems// rig pas bskyed pa'i lus sems

'di// ye shes dag gis bskyed pas na// 'byung lnga ye shes lnga la thim// lhag ma med par sangs rgyas so// de yi thugs rje'i cha tsam las// gzhan don dpag tu med pa 'byung// rgyud chen dri med zla shel
las// rdzogs dang 'bras bu thob tshul te// chos zad gdod nas sangs rgyas so// rdzogs rim 'bras bu'i rgyud tshig le'u zhe brgyad pa'o// sa ma yA/ yang cig rdo rje 'chang chen la// rdo rje
can gyis yang zhus pa// kye ma ston pa rdo rje 'chang// yon tan 'bras bu bshad lags kyang// sems can rnams kyis mi go nas// 'khor ba dag tu 'khyams gyur na// dbang po tha ma nyams len med// de la bar
do 'char bas na// bar do'i rim pa gsung du gsol// zhus pa'i lan du bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa che// ngas bshad legs par yid la zung// bar do'i rnam grangs bzhi ru 'dus// dang por skye
gnas bar do ni// ma las skyes nas ma shi'i bar// thos pas phyi yi sgro 'dogs bcad// sgom pas nang gi sgro 'dogs bcad// khreg chod gsang ba'i sgro 'dogs bcad// nyams len khreg chod thod rgal

nyid// rtags tshad gdengs bzhi'i rnal 'byor ro// bar do ma bu lam sbyor nyid// grol sa nyid ni khreg chod do// gang zhig lam gyi rnal 'byor rnams// nyams su len par byed pa la// bar chod bdud kyis khyer
bas na// bdud kyi gol sa bcad pa gces// e ma lam gyi rnal 'byor nyon// rtog pa mtshan mas bcings pa'i bdud// bsam gyis mi khyab grangs mang zhing// brjod du med pas bsam mi khyab// rnam rtog
mtshan mas bcings gyur na// thams cad bdud kyi rang bzhin te// de yang mdor bsdus 'di lta ste// gzung 'dzin yul chags phyi yi bdud// rnam rtog 'khrul bar spyod na nang gi bdud// dregs pa kha
'jam bdud kyis bslus pa yin// lus la rgyan bzang thogs pa bdud kyis bslus// gnyen gyi kha 'jam bdud kyis bslus pa yin/ dgra la chags na bdud kyi bsdus pa yin// bdag rgyu dreg na bdud kyi
bsdus pa yin// 'dzin pa'i yul la chags na bdud kyi bsdus pa yin// ting 'dzin ro la chags na nang gi bdud// snang ba'i yul la chags na yul gyi bdud// yin min the tshom skyes na rtog pa'i bdud// bya
byed g.yeng bas khyer na 'khor ba'i bdud// longs spyod 'khor la chags na g.yeng ba'i bdud// rtog pa khong du chud na sems kyi bdud// gzung 'dzin chos la chags na yid kyi bdud// 'khor ba'i chos la
chags na 'ching ba'i bdud// rtsod pa'i gtam la chags na nyon mongs bdud// snying sdud ro la chags na lha yi bdud// khro gtum dpa' rngams che na 'chi bdag bdud// sgom pa'i lha la chags na 'ching ba'i
bdud// chags sdang lnga la chags na ngan song bdud// chos spyod bcu la spyod na gnas pa'i bdud// 'khor ba'i lam la chags na rmongs pa'i bdud// chos la smod pa 'dzud na phrag dog bdud// gzhan la sun
'byin khyer na nga rgyal bdud// pha rol spong bar byed na skyon gyi bdud// chos pa rnams la chos ma bdud// chos ma rnams la chos pa bdud// gnyis ka'i bdud ni 'dod chags yin// de bzhin
bdud kyis bslus pa bsam mi khyab// brjod kyi mi langs grangs mang yang// rtsa ba bdud bzhi chom gyur na// bdud rnams gzhan gyis glags mi rnyed// gzhan yang nor 'khrul thams cad kun// bdud kyi dbang

du song ba yin// rnyog pa med pa'i rang sems dang// rtog pa med pa'i rang sems gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba yin// ma sgrib gting gsal snang ba dang// 'gro ba'i sems

rgyud zhen pa gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba yin// ma btsal bzhag pa'i sgom pa dang// chos ma nus kyi btang snyoms gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang

song ba yin// dran med rig pa'i yul snang dang// dran bsam 'gro drug 'khrul pa gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba yin// chos nyid dag pa'i bar do dang// yi dam lha yi sgyu lus

gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba yin// rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing khams dang// theg pa bgrangs ba'i zhing khams gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song
ba yin// sku gsum 'bras bu mthar thug dang// sna tshogs ma nges lhun grub gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba yin// rig pa mngon sum lta ba dang// spyod lam blo yi the
tshom gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba yin// rtsol med rig pa'i yul snang dang// mtshan bcas sgom pa'i gzugs brnyan gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud

dbang song ba yin// rig pa'i mdzad spyod rol pa dang// 'gro drug 'khrul pa'i spyod pa gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba yin// rang bzhin rnam dag thig le dang// rlung bzungs

mtshan bcas thig le gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba yin// chos sku sha dag snang ba dang// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud

dbang song ba yin// rang rig bsam pa bral ba dang// sems kyi byung tshor sna tshogs gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba yin// shes rab rang rtsal rdzogs pa dang// yid kyi dran pa

phyir shor gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba yin// gsang chen nges pa'i bden tshig dang// ldem dgongs gcun pa'i gal tshig gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba
yin// nges pa'i bcud gsum man ngag dang// mtshan ma dpe yi bslu brid gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba yin// chos pa ri khrod 'grim pa dang// nor rdzi ri khrod

'grim pa gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba yin// sgom chen spyod pa skyong ba dang// chang snyon tho cho spyod pa gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba
yin// chos pa zhen med chags med dang// khram pa ngo tsha btang ba gnyis// 'dra 'dra 'dra ste nor ra re// nor na bdud dbang song ba yin// rang bzhin skye gnas bar do dang// da lta nyid du thag chod

pas// bdud kyi dbang du ma song bar// 'dra 'dra'i 'phrang rnams chod par bya// rig pa ye shes chen po 'di// nam mkha'i ngang du shes par bya// gang gi phyogs su ma shor bar// rang nyid chos skur rtogs gyur

na// bdud ces bya ba rang sar grol// chos sku spros dang bral ba la// mtshan ma'i bdud kyi phyogs dang bral// da bdud las thar par byed pa la// nyams su 'di ltar blang bar bya// shin tu dben pa'i gnas

nyid du// bla ma mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// slob ma snod dang ldan pa la// dbang gis rgyud rnams smin par bya// snang ba sems su dbang yang bskur// sems nyid rig par dbang yang bskur// rig pa chos nyid

dbang bskur ro// de nas dam tshig 'di ltar ro// snang ba yul gyi dam tshig dang// rtogs byed lta ba'i dam tshig dang// spyad rgyu nges pa'i dam tshig dang// bsrung mtshams bral ba'i dam tshig bzhi// lam zhugs

rnams kyis bsrung bar bya// dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba// gud na yod pa ma yin te// rang rig snang ba'i don rtogs na// dam tshig rgyal po zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kun la dam tshig med// sems can dus na
skyon yon byung// yang dag rig pa'i don rtogs na// nyams dang mnyams gnyis las 'das// bsrungs dang ma bsrungs phyogs las 'das// ye bsrung chen po'i don la ltos// gsang pa lam gyi rnal 'byor

pas// gol sa bcad na dbang dam ldan// de la spyod pa gal che bas// rnal 'byor rnams kyis 'di ltar spyod// 'dzin pa yul gyi spyod pa dang// rang snang thabs kyi spyod pa dang// zhen med chags bral spyod pa

dang// rtog med lam gyi spyod pa dang// rtsol sems snang ba'i spyod pa dang// brtul zhugs dbang gi spyod pa dang// gzung 'dzin 'khor ba'i spyod pa dang// rnam pa bdun du bshad pa'o// 'dzin med yul gyi spyod

pa ni// dper na smyon pa lta bur bstan// rang snang thabs kyi spyod pa ni// dper na ri dwags lta bur bstan// zhen med chags bral spyod pa ni// dper na bu chung lta bur bstan// rtog med lam gyi spyod pa ni// rgya
mtsho gza' skar lta bur bstan// rtsol sems snang ba'i spyod pa ni// glang chen smyon pa lta bur bstan// brtul zhugs dbang gi spyod pa ni// dper na stag mo lta bur bstan// gzung 'dzin 'khor

ba'i spyod pa ni// nam mkha'i mdung bskor lta bur bstan// lta ba lam gyi rnal 'byor bas// chos nyid yul gyi lta ba dang// spyod pa thabs kyi lta ba dang// rang rig rgyun gyi lta ba dang// ma nor lung gi lta

ba'o// chos nyid yul gyi lta ba ni// chos nyid dang ni chos can no// spyod pa thabs kyi spyod pa ni// sgron ma bzhi yi lta stangs so// rang rig rgyun gyi lta ba ni// rig pa ye shes snying po ste// ye nas yod pa'i lta ba
yin// ma nor lung gi lta ba ni// rdzogs chen a ti yo gar grags// rnal 'byor pa yis de ltar ltos// da ni sgom pa'i mtshan nyid bshad// rnam rtog rgyun gyi sgom pa dang// stong pa mtha' med sgom pa

dang// mtshan ma gzung 'dzin sgom pa dang// rtsol bral bzhag thabs sgom pa'o// rnam rtog rgyun gyi sgom pa ni// dper na sprin bu lta bur bstan// stong pa mtha' med sgom pa ni// bya long nam mkha'i mtha' 'tshol

'dra// mtshan ma gzung 'dzin sgom pa ni// me la chu ru bsgyur ba 'dra// rtsol bral bzhag thabs sgom pa ni// seng ge gangs dkar zin pa 'dra// 'bras bu khreg chod ngo bor bshad// rgyun chen dri med zla shel

las// rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar do la// gol sa bcad dang lta sgom spyod// rim pa bzhin du bstan pas te// rgyud tshig le'u zhe brgyad pa'o// sa ma yA/ de nas ston pa nyid la ni// khro gnyer can gyis yang

zhus pa// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang// rang bzhin bar do bshad na yang// 'chi kha'i bar do gsung du gsol// zhus pa'i lan du bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gzhon nu khro gnyer can// gang zhig rnal 'byor lam pa
rnams// 'byung 'khrug dbang gi sgyur lus nyams// de dus rang gi nyams len dang// bla ma'i gdams pa dran par bya// 'di dus gang zag rab 'bring gsum// rab ni phung po lhag med du// 'di nyid rang du

rdzogs sangs rgyas// rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar do tshod// 'bring ni lus sems bral ma thag/ rang ngo 'phrod nas sangs rgyas so// chos nyid bar do chod pa'o// tha ma mngal sgo ma 'grims pas// pad+mo lnga la rdzus
te skyes// srid pa'i bar do chod pa'o// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// gang zag lam gyi rnal 'byor pas// lu gu rgyud la su goms pa// rig pa rnam shes srang la thebs// de yi 'bras bu sku gsum
la// 'di nyid rnams ni rang rig pas// rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar ma dor// 'di rnams goms pa'i skyes bu ni// 'byung ba rnams ni rang dengs su// 'od lus thob par the tshom med// sa ni sa la rang thims
pas// lus ni lci zhing zas mi len// langs 'dug 'gro ba'i stobs kun zad// chu ni chu la thim pa'i tshe// kha chu sna chu 'dzag par byed// de bzhin me la me thim pas// kha sna dag ni rab tu
skam// lus ni mtha' yi drod rnams 'chor// de bzhin rlung la rlung thim pas// dbugs ni rang rang yan lag 'phrad// mig kyang gyen la zlog pa'o// rtags 'di su la byung ba de// 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol
tu// nges par ru ni 'gro bas na// de tshe bla ma'i gdams ngag rnams// rang gi rgyud la 'dris par bya// de ltar 'chi kha'i bar do ru// skyel ma 'di ltar khrid par bya// rigs drug 'bros khung bcad pa
dang// 'khor ba dong nas sprug pa dang// 'khrul snang gzhi la bzlog pa dang// ye shes rang mdangs bstan pa dang// rang rig rang sar grol ba'i phyir// rigs drug dbyangs yig don bdun gyis// thig

le 'khor lo tshom bu lnga// bstan pa gang la bab pa yi// rin chen bzhu ba'i khu bas bris// dar snas dril la mgul du btags// 'di ni 'chi kha'i skyel ma yin// chos nyid bar dor grol bar nges// rigs drug
'khor ba 'jom pa yi// btags grol 'khor ba rgyun gcod bstan// rgyud chen dri med zla shel las// rigs drug 'khor rgyun gcod pa ste// rgyud tshig le'u zhe dgu pa'o/ yig

drug rdo rje sgra chen 'di// mthing shog dag la gser gyis bris// lus sam mgul du thogs pa la// de nyid grol bar the tshom med// 'di yi bri thabs bstan pa ni// gser gyi rdo rje rtse lnga la// lte bar sku

gsung thugs yig bri// ra drug dag la thig le drug/ de ru yig drug bkod par bya// oM aHhuM/ a 'a ha sha sa ma// 'a a ha sha sa ma// 'a a sha sa ma ha// yig 'bru drug sau 'di dag la// sku gsum dgongs pa
gsum du yod// de phyir 'dra min gsum du byung// yin kyang ngo bo gcig la 'dus// 'khor ba dong sprug yig drug 'di// 'a yi shes bya stong par byed// a yi shes bya gsal bar byed// sha yi shes bya mtha'

gnyis dag/ sa yi shes bya 'gyur ba med// ma yi shes bya kun la snyoms// ha yi shes bya rang sar dag// yang cig yig drug 'bru bshad na// rdo rje 'chang chen nga yis bshad// a ni chos nyid skye ba med// 'a ni

'gag pa med pa'i don// ha ni skye 'gag gnyis su med// sha ni dag pa dbyings su sgrol// sa ni 'gyur ba med pa ste// ma ni ma bskyed rdzogs pa che// yi ge drug pa'i don rtogs na// gsang sngags gsang ba'i

rgyud chen grol// yig drug don la gnas na skyes bu mya ngan 'da'// rtogs byed rgyal po yin no sgra 'gyur drug la rdzogs// a yis lha yi 'khor sgo chod// 'a yis lha min 'khor sgo chod// ha yis mi yi 'khor sgo
chod// sha yis byol song 'khor sgo chod// sa yis yi dwags 'khor sgo chod// ma yis dmyal ba'i 'khor sgo chod// yig 'bru drug gis rigs drug dong nas sprug/ oM gyis lus kyi skye gnas dag/ a

yis ngag gi 'khrul tshig dag/ hUM gis sems kyi 'khrul snang dag/ 'bru gsum sku gsum rang sar grol// rang byung rdo rje'i rang sgra 'di// 'khor ba dong nas sprug par byed// 'khor ba dong sprug btags grol

rgyud// legs par gtan la phab pa ste// rgyud tshig le'u lnga bcu pa'o// sa ma yaH drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// chos nyid rang sgra dag pa'i tshig/ drug 'gyur rdo rje'i glu tshig gis// rig pa lu gu

rgyud du grol// rigs drug klong du grol ba yi// btags grol tsheg bar nyer drug 'di// rigs drug klong grol zhes su grags// de yi rgyud tshig 'di ltar ro// e ma ki ri ki ri// mas ta b+ha li b+ha li// sa mi ta su

ru su ru// kun d+ha li ma su ma su// e ka la su li b+has ta ye// tsa ka ra b+hu li ti lca ye// sa mun ta tsar+ya su g+ha ye// b+ha ti san b+h+ya gu li ye// sa ka ri 'du ka ni// ma ta ri b+he ta na// pa ra li hi ba na// la khar te ka

la na// saM b+hu ra ta me ke tsar tam pa// su r+ya g+ha ta ra e pa shan// na phar na b+hi ti sa g+hur la sa// ma smin pa g+hu ti rta ya sa// g+hu ra g+hu ra pag khe ra na// laM nar na ra i tha ra pa ta laM// ser na sir na b+her sa pa

lam// b+hud d+ha b+hud d+ha b+hud sha sa gye laM// sA sA/ rI rI/ le le/ i I/ ma mA/ ri rI swA hA/ yab cig kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa 'dis// nad gdon sdig sgrib rnam rtog dang// 'jigs pa brgyad la sogs pa

yi// las dang sdig sgrib thams cad kun// rig pa'i ngang du zhi ba shan ting ku ru ye swA hwA/ tshe dang bsod nams dpal 'byor rnams// rig pa'i ngang du rgyas par gyur ci/ su Sh+ta ku rgyu ye swA hA/ sangs rgyas chos

dang dge 'dun dang// 'khor 'das thams cad rig pa'i ngang du dbang du sdus// pa shang ku ru ye swA hwA// dug lnga dug gsum gnod byed dang// dgra bgegs 'byung po ma rung rnams// rig pa'i ngang du mA ra ya

sod sod// oM aHhUM/ oM aHhUM/ rgyud tshig le'u nga gcig pa'o//// mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i rig pa nyid// gzhi med rtsa bral nyid du grol// kun bzang yum gyi dgongs pa ste// tsheg bar nyer brgyad rdo rje'i

sgra// rang byung rang shar nyid du grol// e ma ki ri ki ri/ mas ta b+ha li/ sa mi ta su ru su ru// kun d+ha li ma su ma su/ e ka ri la b+ha ta ye/ tsa ta b+hu li ta lce ye// sa mtshan tsar+ya su g+ha ye/ b+ha ti si na

b+ha g+hu ye/ ki ri d+ha ki na/ d+ha ka ma ha be ra/ tan pa bar li d+ha/ sa naM kha ra ta ke lan/ e tsa ra sa taM/ ta sa sur+ya g+ha ta ra a/ ma na sa ra b+hi ho/ ting gur/ ma smin pa gu ti la// ta ya g+hur g+hur d+ha pa na kha
sa// ra na laM/ na ra na ra laM// i tha sa tha laM// sir rna sir rna b+he sa ras pa laM// ka se laM sa sa// ri rI/ li lI/ i I/ ma mA/ ra rA/ rgyud tshig le'u nga gnyis pa'o//// 'a a ha sha sa
ma/ thig le drug pa'o// rgyud tshig le'u nga gsum pa'o//// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i dgongs pa ste// tsheg bar brgyad pa zhes su grags// a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ aM

aH/ skye 'gag gnyis su med pa yi// dgongs pa tsheg bar brgyad pa bshad// ka kha ga g+ha nga// tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya// Ta Tha Da D+ha Na// ta tha da d+ha na// pa pha ba b+ha ma// ya ra la wa sha Sha sa ha// k+Sha/ rgyud tshig le'u nga bzhi

pa'o//// bstan pa mi 'gyur dgongs pa ni// tsheg bar bcu gnyis pa ru grags// ye d+ha rma he tu bra b+ha bA// he dun te// ShA na ta tha ga to// h+yab dad te ShAn+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM/ bA di ma hA shra ma Na ye swA

hA// nad gdon sdig sgrib rnam rtog rnams// rig par zhi ba shan ting ku ru ye swA hA// tshe dbang bsod nams longs spyod dang// kha rje dbang thang thams cad kun// rig pa'i ngang du rgyas bar gyur cig/ puSh+ting ku
ru ye swA hA// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang// khams gsum srid gsum thams cad dang// gzugs can gzugs med thams cad kun// rig pa'i ngang du dbang sdus shig/ pa shang ku ru ye swA hA// dug

lnga dug gsum gnod byed dang// dgra bgegs 'byung po thams cad kun// rig pa'i ngang du ma ra ya sod// rgyud tshig le'u nga lnga pa'o//// btags grol 'di yi ming nyid ni// rig pa klong grol zhes pa'o// sa ma

yA/ rgya rgya rgya/ rig stong gnyis su med pa yi// thig le nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// btags grol 'di yi ming nyid ni// snying thig srog gi yang bcud yin// bcu bdun rgyu dang zla shel rgyud// yang gsang bla med snying po'i
bcud// yongs su dril bas thig le che// gang zag lam gyi rnal 'byor rnams// shi ka'i dus la bab tsam na// skyel ma lam mkhan 'di nyid do// 'di las zab pa'i btags grol ni// 'jig rten khams su yod

re skan// de'i rgyud tshig le'u nga drug pa'o//// yang dag pa ni 'di nyid do// dbang po'i zhen ba bzlog pa'i phyir// karma rag+sha 'gri haM hi// phung po'i zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir// b+he ga ra na so gad gling// yul kun

zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir// bu ga ri la b+ha d+hu ti// sems kyi dngos po spur ba'i phyir// raM pa ka la sa mi khye// byung tshor gnas su bcad pa'i phyir// ma tang pha pher ras mi te// 'dus tshogs snang ba ngos bzung

phyir// kha Ta re ka sa mig rlung// rig pa btson rar gzhug pa'i phyir// e ka rad na b+he tshag sha/ 'khrul pa'i rang rgyud khungs bcad phyir// ya ri mu ta sa g+hu li// rigs drug rim gyis bsgral ba'i phyir// ya sing

ra rlung pa la ya// 'khor ba dong nas 'don pa'i phyir// laM pa ko li sa man ta// chos can thur du gzhug pa'i phyir// g+ha ring yaM pa re maM ti// rol pa'i 'byung khungs spur pa'i phyir// bu ga sing ha

pha g+ha la// zhen pa'i 'phreng thag bcad pa'i phyir// ra mi si si khe ta pa// lug rgyud ar la gtad pa'i phyir// bi khu ma la ba taM ki/ lha yi phyag rgya blta ba'i phyir// sa ma nyi ra d+he ra pa// lta sgom log pa dag bya'i

phyir// badzra sa twa tri tro me// sa lam dus gcig bcad pa'i phyir// g+he pa su g+har rnam ye// yid spyod lta ba khung bcad phyir// d+harma pa ti sa g+hu li// sku gsum lam du bslang ba'i phyir// ras rmi pa la kha rgad tshe// snang

ba dngos su blangs pa'i phyir// ru ba sa mi mi ta lam// sgra yi zhen pa mtha' bcad phyir// nga tig pa ya ka li sa// bsam gtan chen po'i sa non phyir// ga tshang sa yab i toM// 'phrin las mtha' ru 'byung ba'i

phyir// karma e ka ma nu sa// sangs rgyas mngon zhen bzlog pa'i phyir// sang kri ma ma karma ta// rgyal sras rnams kyi gnas btsa' phyir// nga la khe pa ki li sa// rig stong gnyis su med pa'i phyir// dbyings nas

rang byung tshig tu grags// kun bzang yab yum gnyis med kyi// dgongs pa rang byung rang shar nyid// re res grol bar nus pa ni// chos nyid rang sgra rang shar bas// thig le nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// btags grol thig
le chen por grags// rgyud kyi khong snying dam pa ste// rgyud tshig le'u nga drug pa'o// thig le chen po'i bri thabs bstan// mthing shog sngon po gru bzhi pa// mtho gang sor bzhi yod pa
la// mtha' mar mu khyud lnga ldan bskor// de yi nang du mu khyud gcig/ rten 'brel tsheg bar bcu gnyis bri// de yi nang du yang gcig bskor// de la A li tsheg bar brgyad// bar 'dir mu khyud sor gnyis

bskor// thig le'i yul lo// de yi nang du mtheb gang bskor// la kun bzang yum gyi sngags// tsheg bar nyer brgyad sham bu bri// de yi nang du mtheb gang la// kun bzang yab kyi dgongs pa ste// rgyud tshig tsheg

bar nyer drug bri// de yi nang du mu khyud lnga yis bskor// de yi nang du lnga ldan rdo rje bri// rdo rje'i lte bar 'bru gsum yi ge bri// g.yas g.yon yig 'bru bri bar bya// bar khyam sor gnyis bskor bar bya// thig le

nyi shu rtsa lnga nang// tshig dang sngags su bsdeb pa ni// nyi shu rtsa lnga bri bar bya// de yang zung du bsdeb pa'o// de rnams rin chen sna lngas bri// khyad par gser dang dngul gyis bri// dus tshod tshes grangs bzang po
la// bsrung ba rab tu gnas par bya// mchod gtor bsham zhing gsol ba gdab// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams spyan drangs la// 'khor
lo de la bstim par bya/ 'khor lo'i sngags rnams brgya rtsa bklag/ ma grub nyer gcig bklag par bya// de nas lte ba la dar snas dril// dbang bskur rgyud bkrol dbu la btags// 'di ni btags

grol thig le che// rgyud tshig kun gyi snying phyung pa// le'u nga bdun pa ru grags// sa ma yaHgter rgya/ sbas rgya/ thams cad chos// thams cad nam mkha' rnam par dag pa// sarba d+harma// sarba a ka ma ni/

btags grol thig le klong rdzogs zhes bya ba// brdal ba rang byung chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// kaHaHkhaHtsaHtshaHdzaHwaHtaHthaHTaHTaHTaHraHthaHdaHnaHnaHpaHphaHbaHmaHyaHraHlaHshaHsaHhaHk+shaHk+sha/ g+ha dz+ha d+ha b+haH'i+ai+auHHHsbuHzhus+ya
rtaH A k+Shi khamaHgaHg+haHd+haHts+kaHtshadzuHdz+nya[\u0f7f]dz+nyaHTAHthasaHt+tahaHNaHtiHthadaHtadz+han rna pa sa phakabra b+ha m+ma tha yatha/ rla l+ma shab+ha saha h+ma k+sha/ btags

grol thig le glong rdzogs 'di// yig 'bru dgu bcu go dgu yod// tshan pa rnam pa gsum du yod// thig le 'phreng gcig ma ru bris// lus sam mgul du thogs par bya// rgyud tshig le'u nga brgyad pa'o/// sa ma yAH
'dzin med rang grol snying po'i sgra// rang rig mngon par gtan la phebs// thugs rje mthong grol zhes su grags// de yi yang snying 'di dag go/ aHhaH'aHshaHmaHoMHAHhUMHAHmaH'aHsaHshaHnaHd+harmaHsarba/

kamaHb+hinaHsarbaHg+hataHd+hasiraHsarbaHspashoHd+ha ni sAHsama'u b+haHd+ha duHshahaHsArbaH ban ti paraHsarbaHTa du NaHyA+eHsarbaHAHoMHkaduHblaHoMHsaraHsho ta ni/ thugs rje mthong grol zhes bya ba// thugs kyi yi ge zhe drug
yod// 'phreng gcig ma ni gser gyis bris// mgo 'jug ma log lus la btags// rab gnas sna tshogs gos kyis dril// 'di yang zab pa'i man ngag go/ rgyud tshig le'u nga dgu pa'o//// yang cig rdo rje 'chang
chen gyis// rdo rje'i tshig drug btags grol bstan// 'di btags 'khor ba rkang drug 'joms// rigs drug yul stongs 'khor rgyun chad// de yi gsang 'khor ma bu gsum// kha sbyor mgo mjug ma log

par// dam tshig ldan pas lus la bcangs// sa ma ya/ sarba a ba ma la gser gyis bris la 'di gnyis kha sbyar ro// dbyings mi 'gyur dbu rgyan nga'i brda yig go/ d+ha thim// b+he tra a lo ka/ a naM pa laM ke/ sarba

ma ni sha/ a a+a a+aa m+ma/ a ka sar na h+ya rgya ram/ sgron ma dbyings kyi btags grol 'di bar du chug cig/ sa ma ya/ rdo rje 'chang gi rgyud tshig ni// klong gsal 'bar ba gsum gyi srog/ rdo rje tshig drug
btags grol te// rgyud tshig le'u drug cu pa'o//// e ma ston pa thugs kyi gter// las zad skal ldan snying gi bu// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la// thun mong man ngag bsam 'das kyang// mchog gi
man ngag khyad par can// gang zag shi kha'i bar do ru// btags pas grol bas btags grol rgyud// rang byung rang shar rang grol nyid// rgyud kyi rnam grangs 'di ltar ro// btags grol 'khor ba

rgyun gcod dang// 'khor ba dong sprug rdo rje'i sgro// rnam pa gnyis ni ma bu'i tshul// thig le chen po rgyud lnga dang// thig le klong rdzogs ma bu gsum// thugs rje mthong grol zhes drug pa// rdo rje tshig drug 'khor lo
gsum// spyi ru dri lan drug tu 'dod// 'di las zab pa yong re skan// 'di yi bri thabs bstan pa ni// mthing shog dag la gser gyis bris// dus tshod tshes grangs bzang la gtad// rang gnas mchod bstod

rgyud kyang bklag/ rang nyid rgyal bzhi khror bsgom// rgyud rnams la yang bstim par bya// de nas las ldan bu nyid kyi// sku gsung thugs la dbang yang bskur// ye shes gsum gyis rgyas btab bo// gzhan gyi don

chen bya 'dod na// phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyag mtshan gces// mtshan ma byung ba'i dus su bgrangs// des kyang rang gzhan thams cad grol// 'chi kha bar do med par 'gyur// zhal gdams rgyud tshig le'u ste re
gcig pa'o//// da rung yang dag bshad par bya// btags pas grol bas btags grol 'di// skal ldan su yis bcangs pa'i mi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gdung 'dzin yin// 'di nyid 'das tshe gdung bsregs
na// dben pa'i gnas su spur khang brtsigs// steng du spur bzhag slas zed la// tsan dan rgya shug 'bru mar sbyar// bu slob dam tshig ldan pas bsregs// gsol 'debs mchod bstod rol mo 'bul// de la
rtags ni 'di ltar 'byung// 'ja' 'od zer dang me 'od dud pa'i rtags// spur khang mthongs su 'ja' 'khyil dang// dud pa sngo bsang gyen la bslangs// g.yas su 'khyil cing me 'od dkar// g.yo 'gul med

cing me lce ring// drang por mda' ltar gyen la 'bar// de ni me 'od dud pa'i rtags// nam mkha' dwangs shing rlung dmar med// yang na 'ja' 'od sna lnga 'khrig/ de la gdung rigs lnga 'am gcig/ gang rung cig

ni 'byung bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma'i gdung// las dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung// sha khrag lus dang yan lag bzhi// 'byung 'dus lnga la 'di ltar 'byung// chu

ri raM ni khrag las 'byung// ba ri raM ni sgal las 'byung// nya ri raM ni yan lag rkang// pany+tsa raM ni snying las 'byung// byung bas 'bras bu gang thob na// sha ri chu yi ba ri yis// skye med yon tan longs

sku thob// nya ri pany+tsa raM gyis su// sprul pa'i sku lnga nges par thob// yang na sha ri raM gyis skye med thob// chu ri raM gyis yon tan 'phel// ba ri raM gyi longs sku thob// nya ri raM gyis sprul sku thob// pany+tsa raM gyis sku
lnga thob// sangs rgyas sku lnga sangs rgyas ye shes lnga// rgyud 'di bcangs shing klog pa 'am// snying po btags grol btags pas thob// gdungs tshad mang nyungs nges pa med// gang zag nyams len
zhen pa 'am// mngon sum don la lta nan chung// le lo snyoms las can rnams la// btags grol 'di nyid btags par bya// chos nyid mngon sum ngo yang sprad// shi dus dbugs la sleb kyang chog/ bsreg dus
spur dang mnyam por bsreg/ yang na snying khar bsreg par bya// rgyud chen dri med zla shel las// gang zag shi kha'i bar do las// grol bar bya ba'i man ngag bstan// gzhan yang grol bar bya

ba'i thabs// gdams pa sna tshogs nyid du ston// shi kha ma yi bar do ste// rgyud tshig le'u re gnyis pa'o// yang cig ston pa rdo rje la// phyag na rdo rjes yang zhus pa// kye ma ston pa rdo rje 'chang// shi

kha'i bar do gsungs na yang// chos nyid bar do gsung du gsol// zhus pa'i lan du bka' stsal pa// kye ho rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon// ngas bstan legs par yid la zung// chos nyid bar do zhes bya ba// da lta'i snang

ba 'di nub ste// phung po med cing zag bcas bral// snang ba thams cad bden pa'i zhing// rang snang dag pa'i skur snang ste// 'di la the tshom sus za ba// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la sgrib// 'di la dngangs skrag ma skye

zhig/ ji ltar mthong ba'i yul snang kun// sa rdo'i snang ba rang nub ste// snang ba thams cad 'od snang lnga// de yi nang du chos nyid sgra// 'brug stong ldir ba tsam du 'char// 'od zeranyi ma 'bum stong 'gyed// rgyal

ba zhi khro'i lha tshogs rnams// che ba nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// chung ba yungs ma'i 'bras bu tsam// 'bring ba rnams ni ri rab tsam// de la 'jigs par ma byed cig/ rang snang yin par thag chod cig/ mi
'gyur gser gyi thur ma ltar// rang rig yin par thag chod cig/ dpag chen mda' ltar tshul ma log/ shar ba ma yin rang nyams su// ma bu gnyis po ma 'jol cig/ 'di ni dran pas chog pa ste// 'di la gang

zag dbang po dbye// rab ni skad cig gsum las grol// 'bring ni zhag po lnga la grol// 'di ni rang gi rnam shes nyid// 'od gsal tha med pa la thim// rig pa 'od kyi yul can no// tha ma rnams ni sprul sku'i
zhing// bar do med par sangs rgyas so// 'di ni chos nyid bar do ste// rgyud tshig le'u re gsum pa'o//// yang cig ston pa nyid kyis gsungs// de ltar gnad rnams ma shes te// 'od la 'jigs shing zer la

dngangs// sku la rtog pa zos gyur na// dbang po mar la kha 'khyal na// srid pa'i bar do nyid du chud// yad yud phyad phyod nyid du ste// rigs drug gar skyes las la spyod// chos nyid ma mthong ma rig cing// rang
snang dgra ru langs pa rnams// 'khor ba mngal gyi sgor tshud nas// pha dang ma yi rgyu rkyen las// mer mer po dang nur nur po// gor gor po dang nya lta bu// ru sbal bzhin dang sbal pa bzhin// de
bzhin zhag ni bdun phrag brgyad// lte ba dag nas lus rnams bskyed// zla ba dgu dang ngo bcu nas// lus rdzogs ma yi mngal nas don// de ltar gzugs ni tha dad du// 'khor ba nyid nas 'khor ba'o// de yang
'khor lugs 'di lta ste// dga' ldan rtsod ldan myong ldan gsum// sdug bsngal bkres ldan sdug bsngal che// rnam pa drug tu res 'jog 'khor// ma rig 'khrul pas dbang du'o// rgyud chen dri med zla shel
las// bar do rnam pa bzhi ru bstan// khyad par srid pa'i bar do bshad// 'di la 'khrul grol rnam pa gnyis// 'khrul grol zur tsam bshad pa ste// rgyud tshig le'u re bzhi pa'o// sa ma yA/ gter

rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya/ drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen la// phyag na rdo rjes yang zhus pa// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang// bar do'i rim pa gsungs na yang// grol tshul rim pa gsung du gsol// zhus pa'i lan du bka' stsal

pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon// chos nyid bar do shar kyang rung// sngon gyi nyams len 'byongs kyang rung// mngon sum rang snang chod kyang rung// rang ngo shes pa'i gang zag rnams// yar la 'gro lugs 'di

ltar ro// phyi nang med par zang thal grol// spyi snod 'byung ba lnga po yang// rang shar rang grol nyid du grol// nam mkha' nyid ni khyab stong pas// nam mkha' ni dngos po grol// rlung ni gzung yul med snang

bas// dngos po sdud pas las su grol// me ni smin byed zas za bas// bskyed cing dwangs snyigs 'byed par grol// sa ni skyob byed 'gegs pas na// dngos med mtha' yas stong par grol// chu ni sdud byed rlan

pas na// sred byed smin pas las su grol// 'byung ba nyi shu rtsa lnga yang// ye shes rnam pa rtsa ba lngar grol// gzugs su snang ba thams cad kun// rang bzhin med pa'i ngang du grol// gzugs med rnams ni dngos
por grol// chos ni chos kyis grol ba'o// med pa la ni med pas grol// gcig ni gcig gis grol ba la// gnyis su snang ba gnyis kyis grol// chos nyid snang ba rang lugs la// bem po rnams kyang rang grol

nyid// rgyud chen dri med zla shel las// phyi snod grol tshul bstan pa ste// rgyud tshig le'u re lnga pa'o//// yang cig ston pa drug pa ngas// nang bcud sems can grol lugs bstan// kye ma yang cig gsang bdag

nyon// 'bad pas grol ba ma yin te// ye nyid nas ni grol bar gnas// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba la// pha dang ma yi rgyud nyid dag/ 'phen byed rlung gis bskyod pa ni// byang chub rang gi bden pa'o// 'byung
lnga'i rgyu las sa bon ni// stong nyid yul las snang ba shar// bza' mi gnyis kyi snyoms 'jug ni// thabs las byung ba'i shes rab nyid// mngal gyi nang du tshud pa ni// rang rig zhi gnas lhag
mthong shar// bdun tshan rnams ni rtags tshad do// zla dgu ngo bcu sa dang lam// bzhugs gnas don te sprul pa'i sku// thams cad chos nyid stong par grol// de ltar nang bcud sems can rnams// 'bad pa

med par rang grol lo// spyod par ma gyur snang ba grol// sgom pa ma btsal chos can grol// lta ba ma rtogs chos nyid grol// 'bras bu ma bcings rang lus grol// snang ba thams cad rgyas thebs so// rgyud chen

dri med zla shel las// nang bcud sems can grol lugs te// rgyud tshig le'u re drug pa'o//// rang ngo shes pa'i mi rnams ni// ngo bo sku ru rgyas te grol// rang bzhin 'od du rgyas te grol// thugs rje zer du
rgyas te grol// sku gsum 'dzin pa rang sangs nas// thog ma nyid nas ka dag la// rang sa zin nas chos zad do// chos med chos ni ming min no// thog ma nyid nas ka dag la// 'khrul med tsam du brjod pa
med// de bzhin ma 'khrul ba yang ci// de ltar 'khrul pa gdod nas dag// gzhi snang chen po de nyid las// ma rig ces ni ming med pas// 'khrul par grub pa yod ma yin// chos zhes ming du ma grags
pas// bla dgas 'khrul pa ga la yod// thams cad rang grol chen po 'o// gnad kyis grol bas 'bad rtsol zad// ye nas grol bas skyed mi dgos// rang grol yin pas gnyen po med// gcer grol yin pas
mthong sar yal// yongs su grol bas rang bzhin bzhag// dus kyi grol bas bsgom mi dgos// rang bzhin grol bas ma bcings so// grol lo zhes pa tha snyad do// rtogs dang ma rtogs su yi chos// de la
grol zhes su la dmigs// khams su 'jug pa ga la srid// srid mtha' bral ba'i chos nyid do// ye grol yin pas khyad par 'phags// rang grol yin pas yul rkyen zad// gcer grol yin pas rang sar
dag// mtha' grol yin pas mu bzhi 'gag/ gcig grol yin pas du ma stong// thams cad grol bas gcig tu 'dus// rkyen rnams rkyen gyis grol bas na// dmigs pa'i chos la nga mi gnas// yul rnams
yul gyis grol bas na// tha snyad tshig la nga mi rtog// sems nyid sems kyis grol bas na// mtshon byed blo la nga mi gnas// dri mas dri ma bkru ba bzhin// de bzhin dag pas dag pa grol// dug gis dug
rnams 'jom pa 'am// lcags kyis lcags rnams gshag pa 'am// rdo yis rdo rnams gcog pa 'am// shing gis shing rnams bsreg pa 'am// rang rang dgra rnams rang gis byed// rigs mi mthun pas grol mi
'gyur// de phyir gzhi gnas rig pa la// gzhi 'am 'bras bu thams cad rdzogs// rang rig nyid kyi rang rig grol// yul snang nyid kyi yul snang grol// sgrib pa kun las nges par grol// mkha'
ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas// nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po// sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med// dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// ye
shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// phung po lnga don dus gsum du// skad cig gcig gis bye brag phyed// skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang// lus med lus te
lus kyi mchog/ lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa'o// thams cad rig pa'i ngang du rdzogs// mngon sum thabs la gang goms pa// 'di ni skyes bu mda' 'phangs bzhin// tshur la log par ga la 'gyur// yang dag

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// lhag ma med par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// rtags dang mtshan mar sangs rgyas so// don la thams cad rig pa rdzogs// rgyud chen dri med zla shel
las// yar la grol lugs bstan pa ste// rgyud tshig le'u re bdun pa'o//// sna tshogs rig pa'i rtsal yin phyir// rig pa stong pa nyid du grol// rig stong ngo bo chos kyi sku// de la snang ba ma 'gags
gsal// gsal stong rjen pa sangs rgyas yin// bya ba med pas 'khrul pa sangs// rtog pa med pas nyon mongs sangs// 'dzin pa med pas rang byung sangs// zhen pa med pas rnam rtog sangs// chags pa
med pas ma rig sangs// sku gsum ngo bo gcig rdzogs ngang// rtog pa med pa'i rig pa la// 'od lnga gsal ba ye shes rgyas// rig pa bya byed bral ba las// dmigs gtad med pa'i sku gsum rgyas// rig

pa 'od med snang ba las// 'dzin pa'i yul med 'od lnga rgyas// rig pa ye shes chen po la// don ldan rang snang 'bras bu rgyas// de phyir rig pa sangs rgyas yin// sangs rgyas gzhan du btsal du med// sku gsum

sku lnga la sogs pa// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed rnams// rig pa ye shes ngang du rdzogs// de la grol zhes ming du btags// rgyud chen dri med zla shel las// rang rig sangs rgyas yin pa'i tshul// ngo sprod shes
par bya ba'i phyir// legs par gnad rnams bkrol pa ste// rgyud tshig le'u re brgyad pa'o//// rgyud chen dri med zla shel las// rdzogs chen rang skad 'di skad do// dri med rdzogs chen byang chub

sems// mkha' mnyam rdo rje'i sku la bskyod// stong pa nyid kyang lus la rdzogs// sems sogs 'dzin pa'i chos las grol// skye med yang dag ngo bo rnyed pa gsungs// ma bskyed mkha' la rig pa gsal// skye med
klong med klong du yang 'dus// 'gag med klong du de bzhin gshegs// sems sogs 'dzin pa'i chos las grol// rnam dag spyan ldan mngon sangs rgyas// 'bar ba'i 'bar ba ye shes

mchog/ stong pa stong pa'i yul la gnas// dag pas dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rnyed// rgyud chen dri med zla shel las// rdzogs chen rang skad smra ba'i tshig/ le'u ri dgu pa ru bshad//// de nas rdzogs rim bshad
par bya// de nyid khreg chod dgongs pa'o// e ma rang snang rig pa nyon// ngo bo chos rnams stong par rdzogs// rang bzhin chos rnams gsal bar rdzogs// thugs rje'i chos rnams ma 'gags rdzogs// sku gsum

rang rig gzhi snang la// rang byung chen po'i gzhi rnams rdzogs// snang ba yin phyir yul yang rdzogs// rang dag yin phyir sa lam rdzogs// rang rig yin phyir shes bya rdzogs// rang khyab yin phyir 'bras bu

rdzogs// rang sangs yin phyir rgyu rkyen rdzogs// rang rtogs yin phyir chos nyid rdzogs// rang gnas yin phyir rgyud lung rdzogs// rag rdzogs yin phyir dus gcig rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po'i ngo bo la// rang
rdzogs rang grol rang sar rdzogs// brjod bya ji snyed ci yod kyang// rang rang don la sgrib pas ni// mdo don zab mo gcig tu sdud// gnas lugs bsam gyis mi khyab kyang// stong gsal 'gag pa med

pa'o// 'khrul gzhi rnam pa mang bshad kyang// rkyen bzhi 'dus pa'i 'khrul 'khor ro// rang gnas rig stong ye shes lnga// gnas sa thugs dang dung khang ngo// lam ni rtsa bzhi 'gyu byed rlung// 'char byed sgo ni

mig sogs nyid// rkyen bral gsum gyi yul la 'char// nyams len khreg chod thod rgal nyid// rtag tshad sna bzhi'i gdeng bzhi yin// bar do ma bu lam sbyor ba// grol ba nyid ni ka dag go// zhes tshigs rkang
bcu bdun gyis don bsdus te zhabs bsdams pa'o// de skad ces rig pa rdo rje rnon pos bka' stsal pa// phyag na rdo rje la sogs te rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang// rigs gsum mgon po dang// lha dang/ lha ma

yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa rnams rjes su yi rang ste// rdo rje 'chang chen po la mngon par bstod do// rgyud thams cad kyi yang snying// lung thams cad kyi rtsa ba// klong gsal skor gsum gyi spyi rgyud// rgyud chen dri
med zla shel gyi rgyud ces bya ba// rgyud tshig le'u bdun cu pa'o//// gza' dang khros mar gdong mas/ rgyal ba'i bka' 'di srungs shig sa ma yA/ rgyud chen dri med zla shel gyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs
so//// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya/ 'di las zab pa yod re skan/
